name: Lost Kouvos (Alpha)
description:
A platformer where you control 3 characters - a bear, a wolf, and a black woodpecker!

4 levels - 2 easy ones, and 2 challenging ones!

Inspired by games like "Lost Vikings" and "Ori and the Blind Forest" as well as early "rendered 3D" games!

Originally made for a game competition, in one month. The game has bugs and other issues, but is playable from beginning to end!

Music and all visuals by JapeNess!
